00033 class Faction : public UpdatableSOAdapter {
00034 private:
00036      static RefFactionMap mFactionRefMap;
00037 
00042      std::map<const Reference*, const Reference*> mEnemyList;
00043 
00045      RefSet mEnemy;
00046 
00047      void createEnemySet();
00048      
00049 protected:
00054      int mIndex;
00055       
00056      Faction();
00057 
00058 public:
00059      Faction(const DataObject& d);

00061      
00067      void extract(Buffer &b) const;
00068      void addObject(DataObject& toAdd, int64_t initiator);
00069      void removeObject(const Reference& toRemove, int64_t initiator);
00070      void replaceObject(DataObject& newObject, int64_t initiator);

00073 
00081      static Faction* faction(const Reference& ref) {
00082           RefFactionMap::iterator it = mFactionRefMap.find(&ref);
00083           return (it == mFactionRefMap.end() ? 0 : it->second);
00084      }
00085 
00093      bool isHostileTowards(const Faction& f) {
00094           if (&ref() == &f.ref()) {
00095                return false;
00096           }
00097           return (mEnemy.find(&f.ref()) != mEnemy.end() || f.mEnemy.find(&ref()) != f.mEnemy.end());
00098      }
00099 };

00109 class EthnicFaction : public Faction {
00110 private:
00112      static EthnicFaction* sAllFaction;
00113 
00115      static int sCurrentIndex;
00116 
00121      static std::map<int, EthnicFaction*> mFactionIndexMap;
00122 
00124      EthnicFaction() : Faction() {}
00125 
00126 public:
00128      static const int ALL = 0;
00129 
00131      static const int NONE = -1;
00132 
00133      EthnicFaction(const DataObject& d);
00134      virtual ~EthnicFaction();
00135      
00136      static EthnicFaction& all();
00137 
00144      bool isAll() const { return (mIndex == 0); }
00145 
00151      int index() const { return mIndex; }
00152 
00160      static EthnicFaction* faction(int i) {
00161           if (i == ALL) {
00162                return &all();
00163           }
00164           else {
00165                std::map<int, EthnicFaction*>::iterator it = mFactionIndexMap.find(i);
00166                return (it == mFactionIndexMap.end() ? 0 : it->second);
00167           }
00168      }
00169 
00177      static EthnicFaction* faction(const Reference& ref) {
00178           return dynamic_cast<EthnicFaction*>(Faction::faction(ref));
00179      }
00180 };
